tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Remote Code Execution (RCE) via the `readCodeFor` function, due to improper validation of the `supportBigNumbers` and `bigNumberStrings` values. This vulnerability is exploitable when using user-defined database connections.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version of this package <= 3.9.3.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `mysql2` library to the patch version.
